Name: Dowling-Degos disease
Definition: A pigmentation disease characterized by a reticulate pattern of abnormally dark skin coloring

Name: dyschromatosis symmetrica hereditaria
Definition: A pigmentation disease characterized by progressively pigmented and depigmented macules

Name: reticulate acropigmentation of Kitamura
Definition: A pigmentation disease characterized by lesions that initially arise as letiginous

Name: dyschromatosis universalis hereditaria
Definition: A pigmentation disease characterized by reticulate hyper- and hypo-pigmentated macules in a generalized distribution.

Name: conjunctival pigmentation
Definition: A diphtheria that involves a bluish white membrane formation on the faucial pillars

Name: Bloch-Sulzberger syndrome
Definition: A diphtheria that involves a bluish white membrane formation on the faucial pillars

Name: stromal corneal pigmentation
Definition: A bilirubin metabolic disorder that involves elevated levels of unconjugated bilirubin without elevation of liver alanine transaminase and aspartate transaminase enzymes as a result of the deficient ability of hepatocytes to secrete conjugated bilirubin into the bile.

Name: neonatal jaundice
Definition: A pigmentation disease characterized by a high level of bilirubin in the blood

Name: acanthosis nigricans
Definition: A porphyria that has_symptom abdominal pain
